ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Speaking of lower levels...
ygData.msgSnippet: Tszaaz E Taurguin, (27) Povar ... 10pp-20pp, been a long time since I bought mine, just never go t charmed while it was in the throwing slot :o) ... 500-600pp
ygData.messageBody:
Tszaaz E'Taurguin, (27) Povar

>Dragoon Dirk


10pp-20pp, been a long time since I bought mine, just never go t charmed
while it was in the throwing slot :o)

>Mistmoore Battledrums


500-600pp

>Banded armour (and what level should we upgrade to bronze)

Been a while, I have been seeing about 1pp/AC

I started collecting a few bronze pieces but yeah, it was largely too heavy,
so I ended up going back to mix and matched various resist/dex/agi pieces as
I saw them for sale. Now I am headed back to the pursuit of AC, I currently
have bronze Chest and boots, but only while waiting on Lambent.

Tszaaz E'Taurguin (oh, and ya, lots of young Bard questions get answered
here, I am happy to give wildly inaccurate answers to anything, and have
never had a problem getting my inane questions answered)
